mapper.select: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.content, post.writer, post.created_at as createdAt FROM post
SELECT post.id, post.title, post.content, post.writer, post.created_at as createdAt FROM post LIMIT 10 OFFSET 10 * #{pageNum}
SELECT post.id, post.title, post.content, post.writer, post.created_at as createdAt FROM post WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, writer, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} WHERE id=#{id}
